title: California's Cannabis Market - A Deep Dive
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Deep dive on the California cannabis market with industry experts Emily Paxhia and Hirsh Jain. Pain points and reasons for cautious optimism. Taking stock of the California players. The stocks not getting enough attention in the state (it may surprise you!) and why investors should be wary of companies not reporting GAAP figures.
